event_title: Cold Air of an Encroaching Winter

interactivity.requirements: Not Thursday 25 Ayane Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Regularly Scheduled Programming " from Ayane Amamiya

progression.synopsis: Ayane has reserved part of the bathhouse for just herself and Sensei . In the bath, Ayane proposes an "experiment" where they ask each other a question which they can't dodge or talk their way out of. Sensei agrees, but is worried that she'll ask about their relationship. Instead, she asks whether she would be a good mother, and is pleased when Sensei tells her that she would. Sensei asks his own question â€” if Kirin walked in on them during the beach vacation , he asks her to talk about that; if not, he asks her why she chose her question.
trivia: The conversation with Ayane changes depending on whether or not you have seen Prisoner .

event_references.event_default_name: Cold Air of an Encroaching Winter
